enhanced_description: Aon plc is a British-American professional services and management consulting firm globally present in over 120 countries, specializing in risk-mitigation products and data and analytics services. The firm provides expert advice and solutions to empower clients to make better decisions, protect assets, and foster business growth. Aon's HR technology offerings, specifically under its Human Capital solutions, encompass comprehensive HR management suites, talent management, total rewards, and recruiting. These solutions are designed to build a resilient workforce, boost hiring manager confidence and productivity, support a healthy and productive workforce, and aid in attracting and retaining talent, complementing their core services like risk analytics and health & benefits.
